frontend.consumers module¶

Django Channels consumers for the frontend

class frontend.consumers.WebSocketConsumer(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: channels.generic.websocket.JsonWebsocketConsumer

A Consumer that manages WebSocket Pub/Sub connections, dispatching data to the various topic handlers

disconnect(code)¶

The WS connection was closed. Let all handlers know. :param code: :return:

receive_json(content, **kwargs)¶

Received raw JSON data over the WebSocket :param content: :param kwargs: :return:

static get_handler_name(topic)¶

Returns a valid handler class name for the given topic. Strips all non-word characters, converts to title case, removes spaces, and adds “Handler” to the end. :param topic: :return:

send_to_client(message)¶

Called by handlers to send messages directly on the client channel. :param message: :return:
